name: Yuzu
description: This fall we were overjoyed to find locally grown yuzu in an amazing organic orchard near to us. This exotic citrus fruit is prized for it's heavenly scent and flavor that is like like a lime with a hints of grapefruit and sour orange. When we were prepping the fruit for this jam, we filled the entire kitchen (and building) with the lovely scent of the yuzu. The yuzu fruit is rarely grown in the US and we are thrilled we can bring this amazing jam to you just in time for the holidays. This jam will be perfect topping a fruit tart, in a lovely cocktail or with a bite of goat cheese. Jar size: 6 ounces. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Pluot with Rose Geranium

We've mixed this summertime favorite with a few rose geranium leaves that add a hint of rose flavor and scent to the jam. We love this jam on morning scones and will serve it in the evening with our favorite desserts - or maybe with some goat cheese and walnuts. Jar size: 6 ounces. name: Peach with Cacao Nibs
description: When the end of summer comes, one of our favorite farms brings us loads of ripe, golden Rio Oso peaches tinted with hints of red and pink skin. These peaches are buttery soft, juicy and filled with all the perfect flavor of summer. We've added roasted cacao nibs to these juicy peaches for a hint of chocolaty crunch. Cacao nibs are purely part of the cacao bean that's been prepared for making chocolate. There's no added sugar in cacao nibs and they are crunchy, chocolaty treat that's not overly sweet - making them a perfect addition to our sweet summer peaches. We love this jam straight from the jar and it makes a perfect afternoon snack. This jam would also be perfect to share with family and friends at a holiday brunch. Jar size: 6 ounces. description: This fall, one of our very favorite farms brought one of the best tasting pears in the world to market - the Comice. Comice pears originated in the Loire valley in France. Buttery, sweet and with a beautiful fragrance - the Comice pear is a rare find in Southern California. When we cooked these pears the scent coming from our pots was heavenly. We've simply added some vanilla beans for a jam that will leave you wanting more and more. We love this jam straight from the jar or spread on toast. We'd eat it anytime of day - and would pair it with a delicate cheese for an evening treat. Jar size: 6 ounces. name: Grape Jelly
description: Late this summer when the sweetest, most beautiful grapes appeared at the farmers markets we couldn't resist picking up crates of them. We've mixed two lovely French varieties - tiny, sweet golden yellow champagne grapes and golden, honey sweet French chasselas d'ore grapes - into a lovely, soft set grape jelly. This jam will drizzle perfectly over cheeses at your holiday parties. We love this jam and the farmers who lovingly grew the grapes for it. COLOR NOTE: Please note that our jam is a more golden color than what's shown in the photos in the listing. What does a "soft set" mean? Most of our jams don't contain any commercial pectin, we simply use the natural pectin found in the fruit. This means some of our jellies will be softer, or more of a natural set than the super firm types of products you might find in a grocery store that have a lot of commercial pectin in them. You can use them just like you would any other jam or jelly, but they won't have a super firm texture to them. Jar size: 6 ounces. We added sugar and a little lemon juice and cooked this puree for an entire day to turn them into our fragrant spread. Our Membrillo is a sweet spread with an orangish, pink hue. The long cooking time for the quince gives the paste it's beautiful color, texture and flavor. The large amount of pectin in these quince gave the paste a perfect set. We've been eating this one for breakfast, on sandwiches and anytime we need to remember the taste of spring. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Yellow Grapefruit with Candied Ginger
description: This spring we found the sweetest yellow grapefruit at one of our favorite farms, a hidden gem in the middle of citrus country. We've candied the grapefruit peels and added a bit of candied ginger. Each bite features a sweet and tangy grapefruit treat. This jam is a perfect taste of late spring. We serve this jam as an appetizer with some goat cheese or mild white cheese. We've also spread some as a glaze on barbecued chicken or pork. It will pair well with Asian foods and can be used as a dipping sauce. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. name: Tangerine with Rosemary and Sage Honey
description: This spring we picked up the sweetest, most delicate tangerines from one of our favorite farmers. We decided to add a little spring rosemary and some delicate sage honey to these perfect fruits for a jam that will bring you a little taste of spring in every bite. Each jar is filled with bites of candied tangerine peel and has the scent of honeysuckle. This jam is a wonderful sweet treat for scones or an afternoon snack. It makes a wonderful birthday or wedding shower gift. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. name: Lilac Jelly
description: During the late spring and early summer our town is literally filled with the scent and color of lilac blossoms. We've taken these delicate blossoms and infused them to make a delicate and lovely lilac jelly. This pale, soft set jelly is a heavenly golden color and makes a perfect accompaniment to a cheese tray or your favorite soft cheeses. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Cherry with Honey and Balsamic Vinegar
description: Our farmers picked the sweetest, peak of the season fruit for this delectable cherry jam. This rich spread features whole cherries with raw, local buckwheat honey and our favorite sweet, Balsamic vinegar. This one will get better and better as it ages on your shelf! (If it lasts that long!) These cherries are wonderful with grilled meats or with a gourmet sausage. You can also spread it on baguette slices with goat cheese for a quick & easy hors d'oeuvre. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Italian Plums and Anise
description: When we found tiny Italian plums at the market this fall, we couldn't resist picking them up. These small plums are a part of the prune family and are bite size purple plums. We left them whole and canned them in a heavy sugar syrup with anise seeds. We love the taste of the perfectly ripe plums and syrup with a hint of licorice. The plums pair well with an elegant dessert and you can dip your biscotti in the syrup or add mix it for an after dinner drink. Jar size: 11.5 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Preserved Meyer Lemons
description: This winter we found a very special grower with an entire tree of Meyer Lemons for the picking. These lemons are small and a sweeter, milder version of the traditional lemon. They have a thin rind that's perfect for preserving. We decided to add some Hawaiian sea salt for it's soft flavor, lemon juice and a few spices for traditional preserved lemons. These lemons are tangy like pickles and can be added to a tagine of cooked meat. We served them with steamed asparagus wrapped in prosciutto and a slices of the lemons. A little taste of these bright, flavorful Meyer lemons will go a long way in each dish. Jar size: 11.5 oz Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Indian Carrot and Lime Pickles
description: We've taken sweet nantes carrots and turned them into a spicy pickle that will add a little zip to your day! Our Indian Carrot and Lime Pickles are one of our very favorites. Carrots and cippolini onions are marinated in tangy blend of vinegar, lime juice, kaffir limes and spices. You can eat these bite size pickles straight from the jar or serve them with your favorite Indian cuisine. They are also perfect as a lunchtime snack or with burgers from the grill. Jar size: 11.5 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Meyer Lemon with Dark Chocolate
description: One of our favorite farmers grows perfect meyer lemons that are sweet, fragrant and bright as a summer day. We've taken these beautiful lemons and mixed them with Chocovivo stone ground, dark chocolate for a jam that is chocolate heaven in a jar! We spread this jam on everything from Belgian waffles or spread on a favorite cookie for dessert. Get a jar for that special someone (or yourself) and try not to eat the jar all at once! Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Rainier Cherry with Almond
description: Only around for a few weeks a year, we picked up a special batch of these local, delicate cherries. This year our farmer lost most of their crops to a freeze and we were lucky enough to get most of the cherries for our jams. We love watching the Rainier cherries cook to a delightful golden yellow and adding raw almonds for a delicious sweet treat. The cherries have a natural set in the jar. We serve this jam on sweet little almond crackers or as a little something special on a dessert tray. Jar size: 6 oz. name: Satsuma Plum with Sichuan Pepper
description: One of our favorite farmers had small, bright red satsuma plums this year. The taste is perfect and we could eat them all day! We decided to mix these beauties with a few whole Sichuan peppers that we picked up in Paris last spring. The sweetness of the plum is matched by the citrus and warm (not hot) flavor of the Sichuan pepper. We love spreading some of this jam on chicken as we finish grilling to give it a sweet, crispy skin. We also serve the plums with cheeses and recommend Majon Reserva cheese for the best pairing. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Fig Mostarda
description: An amazing treat of sweet candied figs in a mustard balsamic sauce. This summer we candied fresh brown turkey figs and they've been marinating in this sweet tangy sauce. They are an amazing mix of sweet and savory with your favorite sausages or hard cheeses. We'd recommend having a jar on hand to put with any cheese platter. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Cucamelons aka Mexican Sour Cucumbers
description: Not really a melon, these cucumbers look like mini watermelons. Our kitchen crew was over the moon, when a friend brought us a basket full of these tiny cucumbers - or gherkins as they are traditionally known. We couldn't resist the amazing cucumber flavor and burst of flavor from these tiny "cucamelons". When we found a local farm with the mexican sours in stock late this summer, we were thrilled to get some cucamelons to pickle. We've added a few spices and a sprig of tarragon for a wonderfully bright and flavorful pickle full of a slightly tangy and sour burst of cucumber. We are thrilled to bring these pickles to you for the holidays. We think they are a perfect accompaniment to your favorite martini. We are sharing them at all of our cocktail parties this season. And they are a perfect snack right out of the jar and can be eaten anytime of day. Jar size: 8 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Cherry with Star Anise
description: This summer our favorite farmers at the market picked a special batch of their best cherries for us. We've cooked the fruit and added just a little star anise for a lovely, delicate treat! This jam has a delightful hint of licorice and a natural set with no added pectin. If you love cherries, this is the jam for you! You can serve it with ice cream, on your PB & J or just by the spoonful out of the jar. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Pomelo with Candied Ginger and Urfa Biber
description: We picked up giant pomelo fruit from one of our amazing citrus farmers this spring. The pomelo fruits are gigantic and are similar to a grapefruit. They are filled with sweet juice and thick skin. We've candied the fruit and added some candied ginger and urfa biber spice to give the jam some heat. The candied peels are thick and a little chewy and the candied ginger gives this jam a lively kick. Urfa Biber is a flaky mediterranean spice with earthy tones that taste a little like chocolate with a little bit of a spicy kick. We love the layers in this jam and the perfect melding of all the flavors. We brushed it on some grilled shrimp and would recommend it in pork meatballs or any of your favorite summer BBQ items. Jar size: 6 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap! name: Farmers Market Find Pickles
description: As we wandered the farmers market this summer we found the perfect ingredients for pickles - beautifully pale and dark green striped zucchini, giant basil leaves and farm fresh garlic. We picked up bunches of items and decided to put them in jars with our own spice blend. Our Lemon Bird pickles have just the right amount of dill and spice to taste like my grandmother's special blend. Not too spicy or sweet, these pickles are a great everyday treat. Jar size: 11.5 oz. Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!

name: Lemongrass and Thai Chili
description: One of our favorite farmers at the market, brought us a large bunch of freshly picked lemongrass. The stocks were a pale green, tender and beautifully fragrant. We've infused the delicate taste of the lemongrass with spicy summertime Thai Chili Peppers. This jam begins with a sweet taste, leaves a layer of lemongrass on your tongue and then you start to feel the heat of the chilis. The more you eat, the hotter it gets. We love this one with cheeses and it makes an excellent spicy glaze for poultry or seafood. We rub some on a roasting chicken and mix it as a dipping sauce as well. Jar size: 6 ounces Add a gift box to your order and your jams & pickles will come wrapped and ready for gift giving. Click here to purchase gift wrap!
